name: playwright-gherkin-allure
description: Test automation framework using CodeceptJS, Playwright, TypeScript, Gherkin, and Allure

scripts.test:all: codeceptjs run --plugins allure && npm run allure:serve
scripts.test:web:report: codeceptjs run --grep '@web' --plugins allure && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:api:report: codeceptjs run --grep '@api' --plugins allure && npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open

author: Bojan Pavlovic
